annotation.text: A function curving above and below the x-axis

The function begins at the origin and increases, returns and passes through 3 comma 0 below the x-axis, turns and passes through 6 comma 0 and increases, then turns and returns to the x-axis at 10 comma 0.
The area above the x-axis and under the curve between x equals 0 and x equals 3 is shaded and labeled A sub 1 equals 2
The area above the x-axis and under the curve between x equals 3 and x equals 6 is shaded and labeled A sub 2 equals 2.5
The area above the x-axis and under the curve between x equals 6 and x equals 10 is shaded and labeled A sub 3 equals 9
